statements: SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, videos FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT lecture_slides, quizzes FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT course_id, videos, quizzes FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, lecture_slides, videos, quizzes FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT course_id, videos FROM course_materials WHERE course_id > 2 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, lecture_slides FROM course_materials WHERE course_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM course_materials;
SELECT * FROM lecture_materials;
SELECT title, slides_url FROM lecture_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT id, title FROM lecture_materials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, title, video_url FROM lecture_materials WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM quiz_materials WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM lecture_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, slides_url FROM lecture_materials WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM lecture_materials WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title, video_url FROM lecture_materials WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT id, title, count(questions) as num_questions FROM quiz_materials GROUP BY id, title;
SELECT * FROM LectureSlides WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM LectureSlides ORDER BY lecture_id DESC;
SELECT lecture_id, title FROM LectureSlides WHERE title LIKE 'Introduction%';
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE url = 'https://www.example.com/video1';
SELECT title, url FROM Videos ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureSlides WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM LectureSlides WHERE title LIKE '%Chapter%' ORDER BY lecture_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE video_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT quiz_id, title, jsonb_array_length(questions) AS num_questions FROM Quizzes WHERE jsonb_array_length(questions) >= 5 ORDER BY num_questions DESC;
SELECT title, url FROM Videos WHERE title ILIKE 'Introduction%' AND url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides ORDER BY slide_number DESC;
SELECT video_title, video_duration FROM videos WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT quiz_title, jsonb_array_length(quiz_questions) AS number_of_questions FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT course_id, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type LIKE '%pdf%';
SELECT slide_id, course_id, slide_number FROM lecture_slides WHERE slide_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT video_title, video_duration FROM videos WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_title, jsonb_array_length(quiz_questions) AS question_count FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM course_materials;
SELECT * FROM lecture_slides ls JOIN course_materials cm ON ls.course_id = cm.course_id WHERE ls.slide_number BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY ls.slide_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureSlides;
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM LectureSlides WHERE course_id = 123;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 456;
SELECT video_title, video_content FROM Videos WHERE course_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM LectureSlides WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_questions FROM Quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM Courses WHERE course_name ILIKE '%Programming%' AND instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT material_type, material_description FROM CourseMaterials WHERE course_id = 202 ORDER BY material_id ASC;
